nodes.text: In a Pinch was the fourth leg of the dangerous Dragonbane circuit. This leg took swoop racers through a narrow crevasse, winding its way up to a ridge which was steep. Halfway through the leg, the crevasse narrowed to the point that only one swoop could pass through it at a time.

Due to the difficulty this leg caused, seasoned Dragonbane swooper and leader of the Black Seraphs Sunny Bounder would typically make her winning move here, thanks to her skills and the nimbleness of her modified Flare-S.
